summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Bennett Street and Dawson Street, each from 46th Avenue South to 48th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues,, by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7366, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
